reviews.review_msg: Poorly conducted class. Tasks are immense (weekly book chapters + articles, lectures + extra asynchronous material), & lectures were extremely dry/tedious. Assignment expectations were somewhat clear, but final exam was quite literally impossible given time constraints, did not match study guide, and was a poor demonstration of our learning. 2/10

Just... yikes. This experience was one of the driest and most unenjoyable experiences imaginable. Dr. Currie was not a bad person at all but the course was so poorly designed. Confusing rubrics for assignments mixed with horrid marking scaling students down, and a final exam that was so brutal - 50 Qs in 60 mins? Wouldn't recommend in ANY SITUATION
